abstract: Vows column on wedding of Valerie Masten and Jon Bonne.
lead_paragraph: After a series of heartbreaks and long distance dating, the couple find they complement each other perfectly.

headline.main: Valerie Masten and Jon Bonné: Brought Together by a Shared Love of Wine
headline.print_headline: Tannic Beginnings Give Way to a Smooth Finish

snippet: After a series of heartbreaks and long distance dating, the couple find they complement each other perfectly.
